summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2438, for the improvement of Rainier Avenue, from Jackson Street to Atlantic Street; Dearborn Street from Rainier Avenue to a point 750 feet west of Rainier Avenue, all in the City of Seattle, by planking the same, by constructing wood walks, curbs and gutters and the necessary approaches, and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 25903 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
